summary: TL*THE CONTACT LEASES A 2006 JEEP LIBERTY.  WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE STEERING WHEEL BEGAN TO LOCK AND THE TEMPERATURE GAUGE INCREASED.  THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO PULL OFF THE ROAD.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER WHO STATED THAT THE TENSION BELT WAS FAILING.  THE WEATHER WAS HOT AND HUMID WITH A TEMPERATURE OF APPROXIMATELY 60-70 DEGREES.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE IS 13,200 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 13,100.   UPDATED 02-01-08 *BF     UPDATED 02/01/08  *TR
